actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue annually a proclamation designating January of each year as "March of Dimes Birth Defects Prevention Month".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue annually a proclamation designating January of each year as "March of Dimes Birth Defects Prevention Month".

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue annually a proclamation designating January of each year as "March of Dimes Birth Defects Prevention Month".
